title: mcjobs如何设置用金钱加入
author: 夏天不太冷
txt_content:
配置文件：
max_pay: -1
percent_cost: 95
show_pay: true
timers:
  time_interval: 60
  rejoin_interval: 360
  player_save: 15
  show_interval: 5
  delete_cache: 180
max_jobs:
  default: 1
  Members: 5
  Admins: 6
ranks:
  novice: 1
  apprentice: 10
  trained: 20
  professional: 50
  veteran: 100
  expert: 250
  master: 500
  grandmaster: 1000
backend:
  type: file
  user: user
  pass: password
  database: sql
  host: localhost
  port: 3306
advanced:
  language: chinese
  usePerms: false
  multiWorld: false
  payment_type: money
  payment_mod: vault
  log_mod: none
  pay_scale: 1
  xp_modifier: 10
  pay_spawners: false
  spawn_distance: 8
  nopitch: false
  prune: false
  version: 3100


职业文件：
jobs:
  采矿工:
    description: 矿工通过用破坏方块获得工资.
    basepay: 0.6
    exp: 0.25
    break:
      pays: true
      hide: false
      tier1: stone coal_ore netherrack dirt sand grass
      tier2: iron_ore glowing_redstone_ore gravel clay
      tier3: gold_ore lapis_ore glowstone emerald soul_sand mycel
      tier4: diamond_ore
      tier5: obsidian
